Title: Expands the healthcare services provided by telehealth
Summary: Expands the healthcare services provided by telehealth; removes the sunset date of such expansion.
LawCode: Amd ยง2999-dd, Pub Health L; amd Part V ยง7, Chap 57 of 2022
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to expanding healthcare services provided by telehealth; and to amend part V of chapter 57 of the laws of 2022 amending the public health law and the insurance law relating to reimbursement for commercial and Medicaid services provided via telehealth, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
